name: Three Little Words
description:
Tonight's the night. Kagerou's only got one chance to tell her girlfriend exactly how she feels. But will she strike when the time is right, or will her nerves get the better of her?

This is my entry for Touhou Fan Game Jam 2! The theme of the jam was "Only Once", so I decided to work it into a simple romance story. I had to teach myself Twine and a little bit of CSS to get this to work, so hopefully it's not too rough around the edges!
